channel.title: Need 24/7 Hoster for my new server
channel.description:
Need a 24/7 Hoster for my new server i coded :) I currently can only host using U-Torrent for around 4 hrs a day which isnt good at all this is why i need a 24/7 hoster.
I dont need no flame all i am looking for is a 24/7 hoster. If you are my hoster all you need to do is keep server online, no compiling nothing just running using Run.bat
If you be my 24/7 Hoster ofc you will get Owner Status. My server is great fun with a lot of features people havent thought of on private servers yet! Im not going to mention them because i want to see dedciation not just for the fact that you want to play minigames lol.
Well.. All i can say really, if you can host for me either leave a message on this Topic or add me at Jamesbarker123@hotmail.co.uk and contact me on Msn! Thanks for your time.
